author: SARAH RANKIN Associated Press
title: Virginia gov seeks to delay minimum wage hike due to virus
description: Citing economic uncertainty caused by the coronavirus pandemic, Virginia Gov. Ralph Northam has proposed an amendment to a bill increasing the state’s minimum wage that would delay its implementation several months
content:
RICHMOND, Va. -- 
Citing economic uncertainty caused by the coronavirus pandemic, Virginia Gov. Ralph Northam proposed an amendment to a bill increasing the state's minimum wage that would delay its implementation several months, his office announced Sunday.… [+3071 chars]
